Articles.Content:
![ut9bb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ut9bb.jpg)

**Cargo Jet Challenge!**

How much cargo can you pack onto a plane and still manage to takeoff?

**Rules:**

-**Three competition classes:** 

 ***Class 4*** - maximum of 4 engines

 ***Class 8*** - maximum of 8 engines

 ***Class Unlimited*** - unlimited number of engines

**-Must only use KSP v0.15 Vanilla parts**

**-Jets and Turbojets only. You may use solid rocket boosters for assisted takeoff, but only for takeoff. Don\'t be lame and boost yourself the whole way.**

**-You must use the** **Mk1-Fuselage Jet Fuel** **part as the cargo.**

**-Your aircraft must reach at least 3000 meters altitude**

**-Post your screenshot with the competition class and number of fuel tanks**

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Let\'s get started!

**Class 4 - 24 fuel tanks**

> ![QMvkd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QMvkd.jpg)

**Class 8 - 35 fuel tanks**

> ![bvQSD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/bvQSD.jpg)

Gave it another go with 8 engines and a boat load of tanks.

**Class 8 - 48 fuel tanks**

> ![2U1CY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2U1CY.jpg)

**Class 8 - 58 fuel tanks**

> ![D6ZFG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/D6ZFG.jpg)
> ![l5xMy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/l5xMy.jpg)
> 
> ![N5tDP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/N5tDP.jpg)
> 
> ![sS1Vk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sS1Vk.jpg)
I\'ll give this a try tomorrow afternoon. Looks fun

Don\'t feel like doing this tomorrow so I will try this when I get back from California.

Edit: I am not in California right now. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Edit 2: Will actually try tomorrow. ;D
